item.description: Sorry that I had to cancel our last meetup for Southern CT due to weather.  We had great response and I am hoping for the same Feb 9.  Half Moon Cafe is a great little place and the food is terrific.  You are welcome to bring a bottle of wine to share.  We hope to see new and old Amici and don't be shy about coming if you do not share the language, we also share our heritage.  This meetup is $1 per person to keep our website going.  We hope to see everyone then!    I will cancel if bad weather.
item.name: Meet up at Half Moon Cafe Southern Italiano
